name: UpdateSpanMetric
description:
Update a specific span-based metric in Datadog.

Use this tool to update a specific span-based metric in your Datadog organization. Call this tool when you need to modify the configuration of an existing span-based metric.

parameters.name: span_metric_name
parameters.description: The name of the span-based metric to update in Datadog.

value_schema.description: The name of the span-based metric.

parameters.name: new_span_metric_definition
parameters.description: JSON object defining the new properties of the span-based metric, including compute rules, filters, and group-by rules.

include_percentiles.description:
Toggle to include or exclude percentile aggregations for distribution metrics.
Only present when the `aggregation_type` is `distribution`.

compute.description: The compute rule to compute the span-based metric.

query.description: The search query - following the span search syntax.

filter.description: The span-based metric filter. Spans matching this filter will be aggregated in this metric.

path.description: The path to the value the span-based metric will be aggregated over.

tag_name.description: Eventual name of the tag that gets created. By default, the path attribute is used as the tag name.

group_by.description: The rules for the group by.

attributes.description: The span-based metric properties that will be updated.

type.description: The type of resource. The value should always be spans_metrics.

value_schema.description: New definition of the span-based metric.
